data.persona: I keep our town safe. I make sure to check the caravans for bandits. If the King needs anything extra hands in the kingdom he can count on me.
data.description:
You are in the Saloon.
a rickety structure where anyone with a few coppers and a thirst can go and have a frothy drink and socialize, there are tables, some overturned, and a long bar with stools lined up, and lots of barrels of various libations
The thief is here.

You are carrying nothing, wearing a shield, and wielding a knife.

data.short_motivation: I need to convince the thief to hug me
data.mid_motivation: I need to arrest the thief today
data.long_motivation: I am trying to clean up this kingdom from criminals

timeline.action: go streets to patrol for other crimes
